entity.name: GLUG (Gnu/Linux Users Group) PACE (P A College of Engineering)
entity.description: A passionate group of developers focused on building open source solutions to improve daily productivity and personal task management through AI-powered applications.

projects.name: Personal AI Assistant
projects.description: An open source AI assistant to help users manage tasks, smart reminders, and location-based alerts through natural language interaction.
